function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Conduct further research and gather evidence to better understand the impact of gated communities on the spread of covid-19.","category":"Early detection","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Include diverse case studies from different regions and communities to capture a broader understanding of the impact of gated communities on covid-19 spread.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use appropriate statistical methods to determine representative sample sizes and ensure diverse representation within the samples.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement strict health and safety protocols for in-person survey administration, and prioritize virtual survey methods.","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Prioritize virtual survey methods, implement strict health and safety protocols for in-person surveys, and provide necessary protective measures for staff and participants.","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use multiple communication channels and incentives to encourage participation, and consider the representativeness of the sample in the analysis.","category":"Social activities / facilitate social interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ensure clear and specific wording of scale points, provide training to respondents on scale interpretation, and use complementary qualitative methods for validation.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Validation of statistical assumptions, peer review of analysis, and transparency in reporting methods and findings.","category":"Facilitate transparent communication","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Enforce strict adherence to covid-19 preventive measures through education and regulations","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Improve access to local shopping facilities within the community","category":"Improve physical health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Provide safe and
